akas: Bud v klidu, Scooby Doo Czech Republic (new title)
Du er kul, Scooby Doo Norway
akas from release info: Bud v klidu, Scooby Doo Czech Republic (new title)
Du er kul, Scooby Doo Norway

1.title: Some Fred Time
1.plot: With Fred not sleeping the gang decides it is time for a vacation. However their relaxation is short lived when a monster shark terrorizes the beach. The gang must solve the mystery whilst making sure Fred relaxes and doesn't get involved.

2.title: There Wolf
2.plot: When Scooby falls sick, the gang immediately rushes him to the hospital, only to discover it is being haunted by a werewolf. The gang must help Scooby and solve the mystery.

3.title: Renn Scare
3.plot: The gang heads to a renaissance fair from Velma's childhood and must act out the middle ages. A mystery is revealed when the spirit of a jester begins attacking the fair and the gang must quickly come to the rescue.

4.title: How to Train Your Coward
4.plot: Shaggy and Scooby, sick of the monsters and mysteries, leave the Mystery Gang.

5.title: Worst in Show
5.plot: The gang decides to go to a dog show in New York, but they soon discover a mystery. With Fred undercover, Scooby trying to win the respect of other dogs, and Velma and Shaggy switching personalities, it's going to be a tough case to crack.

6.title: Mysteries on the Disorient Express
6.plot: The gang is on a 3-day trip on a train, but when 8 monsters from different parts of the world appear, it's time for action. The monsters are the Grim Reaper, a Mummy, Tzitzimitl, Haniver, a Manticore, Hemogoblin, Tengu, and Tarasque.

7.title: Halloween
7.plot: The gang goes trick or treating on Halloween night but Velma seems to think that Halloween is a disrespect to history while Daphne, Shaggy and Scooby have the opposite opinion. Meanwhile Fred believes you can't solve a mystery on Halloween. But all is explained when the gang runs into a witch and Fred reveals that he ran into the same witch 11 years ago with his cousin.

8.title: The Curse of Kaniaku
8.plot: When a legendary crab monster known as the Kaniaku starts terrorizing Japan, it's up to the gang to stop this creepy crustacean from destroying the big celebration.

9.title: Vote Velma
9.plot: When the ghost of a towns founder begins to scare people away, Velma is forced to go undercover - as a mayoral candidate.

10.title: Scroogey Doo
10.plot: The gang travels to Britain in 1843-ish and runs into Scrooge who claims he was attacked by the ghost of his partner Jacob Marley and that three more ghosts are coming. The gang agrees to solve the mystery but Velma wonders if she has more potential than just solving mysteries.

11.title: In Space
11.plot: Fred accidentally parks the Mystery Machine in the cockpit of a Space Shuttle. The gang arrives at a space station only to find that an alien virus has infected the crew. Can Scooby and the gang solve this mystery before they get infected?

12.title: Doo Not Disturb
12.plot: To get out of a blizzard, the gang decides to spend the night in the Good Son Inn. However, they soon discover that the inn is haunted by the ghost of the owners mother. Will the gang be able to solve the mystery and save the inn?

13.title: Silver Scream
13.plot: When the last film of a famous slapstick comedy actor from the silent movie era is found, his ghost begins terrorizing the studio. Will the gang be able to deal with the ghost and Daphne's tour guide narration?

14.title: Fright of Hand
14.plot: When the gang visits a magic palace, they learn that a demon bunny is scaring away the magicians. With Fred trying to be a magician, Daphne on roller skates, and Velma debunking every magic act, will the gang still be able to stop this rabbit?

15.title: Greece Is the Word
15.plot: When the gang is trapped in an ancient Greek palace, they find a scroll containing a tale of four kids and a dog solving a mystery in ancient Greece. Will this scroll tell them what they need to know to get out of the palace?

16.title: American Goth
16.plot: Shaggy's friend Amelia invites Shaggy and the gang to a party. But Shaggy discovers that Amelia has become a goth. After realizing he has feelings for her Shaggy starts to feel bad that he hasn't changed at all so he decides he too will become a goth. But a mystery appears when an evil plant monster attacks the gang.

17.title: Omelettes Are Forever
17.plot: The gang gets caught up in international espionage and intrigue when they cross paths with British secret agent, Jenny Vex, and must help her complete her dangerous mission of stopping an evil mercenary called Minus from killing breakfast.

18.title: Ghost in the Mystery Machine
18.plot: Fred's worst nightmare comes true when an evil spirit possesses the Mystery Machine and turns his beloved van into an unrelenting monster out to destroy him and the gang before they can solve the mystery.

19.title: Naughty or Ice
19.plot: Daphne brings the gang to a fancy Ice Hotel co-owned by her family where a new exhibit of ice age artifacts is opening. Things heat up, however, when a frozen Ice Man thaws out and goes on a rampage inside the hotel.

20.title: Night of the Upsetting Shorts
20.plot: The gang heads to Shaggy's beloved grandmother's Florida retirement home, where they learn a crazed Ape Man has been frightening the elderly residents.

21.title: Junkyard Dogs
21.plot: Scooby runs into an old kennel mate Axel who is a highly trained Police dog who thinks mystery of the Junk yard monster is too big a case for the gang.

22.title: Protein Titans 2
22.plot: When a video game company tries to buy an old algorithm from Velma and convince her to work for them in San Francisco, the gang becomes embroiled in the mystery of a video game villain who has seemingly come to life, the Ghost Chef.

23.title: World of Witchcraft
23.plot: The gang goes to Salem, Massachusetts for a historical festival, only to discover history repeating itself as a demon has been set loose on the town, summoned by a witch as revenge for the infamous 17th Century Salem Witch Trials.

24.title: Pizza O'Possum's/The Curse of Half-Beard's Booty
24.plot: Two short stories. The first is about an Animatronic Possum that becomes possessed and runs amok in Shaggy's favourite childhood Video Arcade. The second see's Fred come face to face with his longstanding nemesis Captain Cutler who seems to have turned over new leaf as a restaurateur but is plagued by a ghostly pirate.

25.title: Professor Huh? Pt. 1
25.plot: Fred and the gang are called in to help with a mystery involving a figure from Fred's past, Professor Huh? Fred discovers Rose, with whom he learned mystery solving until they had a falling out, has also arrived with her gang.

26.title: Professor Huh? Pt. 6 3/4
26.plot: Fred and the gang are called in to help with a mystery involving a figure from Fred's past, Professor Huh? Fred discovers Rose, with whom he learned mystery solving until they had a falling out, has also arrived with her gang.

1.title: Mystery 101
1.plot: In the series premiere episode, Velma's got an interview at the prestigious Kingston University, the most selective school in the country. The only catch? The dean wants her and the rest of the Scooby gang to figure out why the ghost of Elias Kingston, the school's founder, is haunting Kingston's book-filled halls.

2.title: Game of Chicken
2.plot: Fred gets a call for help from Chuck, his daredevil of a best friend, leading the gang on a rescue mission deep into caverns of an ancient civilization that worships chickens.

3.title: All Paws on Deck
3.plot: The gang climbs aboard the cruise ship run by Fred's cousin despite Velma's strong dislike of water.

4.title: Poodle Justice
4.plot: The gang visits the set of Scooby's favorite TV show and he meets a dog actress who plays a detective on the show.

5.title: Grand Scam
5.plot: Shaggy takes the gang to the Minor League Baseball stadium of his youth only to learn it's about to be shut down because a ghostly baseball player is scaring away all the fans.

6.title: Trading Chases
6.plot: Fred and the Gang go to the history of mysteries museum. When the God Sobek trashes the Egypt Exhibit the tour guide offer challenges Fred's leadership and leads the Gang.

7.title: Be Quiet Scooby-Doo!
7.plot: To solve the mystery of a creepy Crystal Crawler - a bat-like cave monster - the Gang must venture into the Crystal Canopy - a labyrinth of intricate crystal formations. To make things worse, they can't speak a word while in the Canopy, because even the slightest sound will bring the crystals crashing down around them!

8.title: Party Like It's 1899
8.plot: Daphne brings the gang to a Victorian murder mystery party, so they can dress up and solve a fake mystery for once. But when an actual Headless Count starts kidnapping people for real, the gang must stay in character as they tackle the real caper!

9.title: Screama Donna
9.plot: To solve the mystery of a ghostly performer haunting her former venue, the Gang has to pretend to be a rock band themselves! But can they solve the case before Velma has to actually get on stage and sing?

10.title: Kitchen Frightmare
10.plot: Shaggy and Scooby's favorite chef is finally opening his own restaurant but a monstrous Yeti threatens the opening night. The gang has to solve the mystery before dessert is served, while Shaggy and Scooby have to resist eating all the food that's meant for the customers!

11.title: Me, Myself and Al
11.plot: The gang visits a technology company to solve the mystery of an evil robot who has been wreaking havoc.

12.title: Area 51 Adjacent
12.plot: Daphne had always dreamed of meeting extraterrestrial life, but that dream becomes a nightmare when the gang gets caught up in the mystery of a scary alien monster and brought to Area 53 - a government facility so secret, it's two numbers higher than Area 51!

13.title: When There's a Will, There's a Wraith
13.plot: It's a classic haunted house caper when a rich man, whose life Scooby once saved, writes Scooby into his will! Now, to collect his share of the fortune the gang must spend a night in a creepy mansion along with the rich man's kooky relatives and a spooky phantom!

14.title: If You Can't Scooby-Doo the Time, Don't Scooby-Doo the Crime
14.plot: Fred takes the gang to visit The Vault, an old prison that is haunted by the ghost of Stealin' Stan, who died trying to escape from the prison.

15.title: Scary Christmas
15.plot: It's Christmas Eve and Fred is ready to solve a Christmas mystery! Unfortunately, the gang has arrived in a town that's being attacked by a Pterodactyl and it doesn't seem to have anything to do with Christmas!

16.title: Gremlin on a Plane
16.plot: The Gang has seats on the largest airplane ever to fly the open airways! Unfortunately, the plane is also beset by a Gremlin bent on sabotaging the flight! The Gang has to step up to solve the airborne mystery as well as deal with something even scarier: Daphne in the pilot seat!

17.title: Sorcerer Snack Scare
17.plot: The gang goes to the Sorcerer Snacks factory, where a real sorcerer is scaring everyone away. Meanwhile, Fred finds he can get Shaggy and Scooby to do anything he wants with a box of Sorcerer Snacks.

18.title: Saga of the Swamp Beast
18.plot: The gang visits a bayou in New Orleans, where a swamp monster is frightening away anyone who comes into his swamp. Meanwhile, Daphne pretends to be a vampire.

19.title: Be Cold, Scooby Doo
19.plot: The gang goes to a ski resort where Shaggy is having his first experience with snow and Daphne is trying to hit Fred with a snow ball. There is also a Snow monster terrorizing the tourists.

20.title: Giant Problems
20.plot: Daphne takes the gang to her ancient castle where a giant is protecting it from the visitors. As the gang tries to solve the mystery, Daphne starts speaking Irish and Fred wears knight armor.

21.title: Eating Crow
21.plot: The gang goes to a farm after Fred gets a crush on Beth, a farmer's daughter. When a living scarecrow appears, Fred tries to impress Beth with his mystery solving skills, while Velma gets severe hay allergies and Daphne begins hoarding animals as "pets" after becoming jealous of Shaggy and Scooby's relationship.

22.title: I Scooby-Dooby-Do
22.plot: The gang goes to a wedding for two close friends with Fred as the best man and Daphne as the maid of honor, but then the wedding turns into a spooky mystery when a ghost bride threatens to ruin everything.

23.title: El Bandito
23.plot: When the gang attends a Day of the Dead festival in Mexico, Fred thinks he can become a legend if he captures the ghost of the criminal El Bandito for the town locals.

24.title: Into the Mouth of Madcap
24.plot: Daphne agrees to watch her friend's kid, Wayne, and convinces Fred to take a night off from mysteries to go to the boardwalk amusement park. Unbeknownst to her, though, the park is being haunted by a fiendish clown, Madcap.

25.title: The Norse Case Scenario
25.plot: The gang goes on a camping trip to hone their mystery skills. But viking ghosts attack and attempt to drive them away.

26.title: The People vs. Fred Jones
26.plot: Fred gets accused of being the mastermind behind a recent mystery and has to go to court to try to prove his innocence.

imdb.plot outline: After finishing up their senior year of high school, the Scooby-Doo-gang decide to travel in the Mystery Machine, seeking fun and adventure during what could possibly be their last summer together. However, monsters prevent them from completing their journey.
imdb.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
plot: The Scooby gang continues to solve mysteries during what could be their last summer together, but monsters and ghouls get in the way of completing their adventures.

After finishing up their senior year of high school, the Scooby-Doo-gang decide to travel in the Mystery Machine, seeking fun and adventure during what could possibly be their last summer together. However, monsters prevent them from completing their journey.
